oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Wave packet dynamics and factorization of numbers
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Mack, Holger
Bienert, Marc
Haug, Florian
Straub, Frank S.
Freyberger, Matthias
Schleich, Wolfgang P.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Quantum Physics
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We connect three phenomena of wave packet dynamics: Talbot images, revivals of a particle in a box and fractional revivals. The physical origin of these effects is deeply rooted in phase factors which are quadratic in the quantum number. We show that the characteristic structures in the time evolution of these systems allow us to factorize large integers.
